020
021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.resolver.annotation.AllSupport;
023import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.resolver.annotation.InventorySupport;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
025import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
026import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseMoney;
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
028import revxrsal.commands.autocomplete.SuggestionProvider;
029import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
030import revxrsal.commands.node.ExecutionContext;
031import revxrsal.commands.parameter.ParameterType;
032import revxrsal.commands.stream.MutableStringStream;
033
034import java.util.ArrayList;
035import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
036import java.util.Locale;
037import java.util.Set;
038
039/**
040 * PercentDecimalResolver
041 *
042 * @author creatorfromhell
043 * @since 0.1.4.0
044 */
045public class MoneyResolver implements ParameterType<CommandActor, ParseMoney> {
046
047  @Override
048  public ParseMoney parse(@NotNull final MutableStringStream input, @NotNull final ExecutionContext<CommandActor> context) {
049
050
051    final String value = trimQuotes(input.readString());
052
053    final String region = TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion();
054
055    return TNECore.eco().currency().parser().parse(context.actor().uniqueId(), region, TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency(region), normalize(context.command().usage(), value));
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public @NotNull SuggestionProvider<@NotNull CommandActor> defaultSuggestions() {
060
061    return context->{
062
063      final String partial = trimQuotes(context.input().peekString().toLowerCase());
064
065      final Set<String> suggestionsParsing = new LinkedHashSet<>();
066
067      boolean item = false;
068
069      if(context.command().annotations().contains(AllSupport.class)) {
070
071        suggestionsParsing.add("all");
072      }
073
074      for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().getCurrencies().values()) {
075
076        if(currency instanceof ItemCurrency && !item && context.command().annotations().contains(InventorySupport.class)) {
077          suggestionsParsing.add("inv");
078          suggestionsParsing.add("inventory");
079          item = true;
080        }
081
082        final String symbol = currency.getSymbol();
083        if(currency.getDecimalPlaces() >= 2) {
084          suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "0.01");
085        }
086
087        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "1");
088        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "10");
089        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "100");
090        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "1000");
091        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "1000000");
092
093        String prefix = String.valueOf(currency.getPrefixes().charAt(0));
094        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "1" + prefix);     //1,000
095        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "10" + prefix);    //10,000
096        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "100" + prefix);   //100,000
097
098        prefix = String.valueOf(currency.getPrefixes().charAt(1));
099        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "1" + prefix);     //1,000,000
100        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "10" + prefix);    //10,000,000
101        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "100" + prefix);    //100,000,000
102
103        prefix = String.valueOf(currency.getPrefixes().charAt(2));
104        suggestionsParsing.add(symbol + "1" + prefix);     //1,000,000,000
105      }
106
107
108      final Set<String> suggestions = new LinkedHashSet<>();
109      for(final String str : suggestionsParsing) {
110
111        if(str.toLowerCase().startsWith(partial)) {
112
113          suggestions.add(str);
114        }
115      }
116
117      return new ArrayList<>(suggestions);
118    };
119  }
120
121  public String normalize(final String command, final String input) {
122
123    if(!input.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).equalsIgnoreCase("all")) {
124      return input;
125    }
126
127    if(command.toLowerCase().contains("deposit")) {
128
129      return "all-items";
130    } else if(command.toLowerCase().contains("withdraw")) {
131
132      return "all-virtual";
133    }
134    return input;
135  }
136
137  public String trimQuotes(final String input) {
138
139    if(input == null || input.length() < 2) return input;
140
141    final char first = input.charAt(0);
142    final char last = input.charAt(input.length() - 1);
143
144    // Check if first and last characters are matching quotes
145    if((first == '\'' || first == '"') && first == last) {
146      return input.substring(1, input.length() - 1);
147    }
148
149    return input;
150  }
151}
